title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety 

Act 2024 (Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited policing security community safety act 2024 (commencement) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety
heading: 2. The 2nd day of April 2025 is appointed as the day on which the Policing,
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of April 2025 is appointed as the day on which the Policing, 
Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024) shall come into 
operation, insofar as it is not already in operation, other than – 

(a) 

section 5 and Schedule 1 insofar as they relate to the repeal of 
section 38 of the enactment specified in column (3) opposite 
reference number 2 in column (1) of that Schedule, 

(b) 

section 300, and 

(c) 

paragraphs (c), (d) and (e) of section 302. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 April, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [107] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
